column.name: entry_status
column.text: 入职状态: 100=待入职 120=身份证识别状态 140=人脸识别状态 160=银行卡是被状态 180=入职信息完善 300=待人工审核 400=已入职 500=审核失败

column.name: store_id
column.text: 用户入职的职位所属门店

statements.statement:
SELECT A.id, A.user_id, A.real_name, A.phone, A.entry_status, A.company_name, A.company_id, C.store_id, D.store_name, A.tenant_code, A.entry_time, A.leave_time,
B.sex, B.identity_card, B.bank_card, B.bank_card_deposit, B.contact_person, B.contact_person_phone, B.birthday, B.nation, B.idcard0_url, B.idcard1_url, B.face_url, B.bank_url
FROM bu_user_entry_info A LEFT JOIN bu_user_extra_info B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN bu_user_job_record C on A.record_id = C.id LEFT JOIN bu_store_info D on C.store_id = D.store_id WHERE 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( B.real_name like '%${key}%' or B.phone like '%${key}%' or A.company_name like '%${key}%' or A.store_name like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and A.id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.userCode??> and A.user_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.userName??> and A.real_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userName)}' </#if>
<#if query.phone??> and A.phone = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.phone)}' </#if>
<#if query.entryStatus??> and A.entry_status = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.entryStatus)}' </#if>
<#if query.companyName??> and A.company_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.companyName)}%' </#if>
<#if query.companyCode??> and A.company_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.companyCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.storeCode??> and D.store_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.storeCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.storeName??> and D.store_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.storeName)}%' </#if>
<#if query.tenantCode??> and A.tenant_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tenantCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.entryTimeBegin?? && query.entryTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.entry_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.entryTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.entryTimeEnd)}' </#if>
</#if>
